text: We are very happy with the quality of education provided by DPS for our Primary 1 child. The school offers excellent value for money while maintaining high educational standards. The spacious campus and big playgrounds provide ample opportunities for children to play and explore. The teachers are dedicated and approachable, ensuring that every child gets the attention they need. The administrative staff is cooperative and always ready to assist with any queries or concerns. Overall, it’s a great school for nurturing young minds in a supportive environment!

This school is truly good. The teachers are kind and dedicated, always ensuring that students receive the support they need to succeed. The lessons are engaging and make learning enjoyable and ample of activities available for all students. Communication with parents is clear and regular, helping us stay informed about our children's progress. Overall, it's a fantastic environment for children to learn and develop.

My kid loved the school, good and friendly staff. Due to personal reasons we left Singapore else DPS is the one our kid would have finished her schooling.
I wish the school all the very best for next chapters.

We are extremely pleased with the school and the positive impact it has on our child. The teachers are dedicated and supportive, creating a nurturing environment that fosters both academic and personal growth. We’ve seen significant improvement in our child’s confidence and enthusiasm for learning. The school's emphasis on values and extracurricular activities is commendable, providing a well-rounded experience. Thank you for your hard work and commitment to the students’ success!

It is truly a blessing to have my children attended this school. The dedication and support from the teachers and staff have been exceptional. Thank you for creating a nurturing and inspiring environment that has greatly contributed to his growth.we will always cherish our time here .. thank you .
